dc:title: Fellow Worker in Christ
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A tribute to Fr. Virgil Michel, educator and liturgist. Describes what he meant to the C.W. community and discusses the similarities between him and P. Maurin.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 67 1939-01-22 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
